About Gimsara C. Jayarathne

Hello! I'm Gimsara C. Jayarathne, a dedicated psychology student at NSBM Green University. I am committed to offering personalized psychological support and guidance. My approach is rooted in empathy and client-centered therapy, aiming to help you navigate life's challenges and achieve emotional well-being.

With a solid academic background and practical experience in psychology, I provide a range of services designed to address your unique needs. My goal is to create a safe and supportive environment where you can explore and overcome personal challenges.
